page.title: 14PORTHMADOG GIRL GUIDES
page.content: Porthmadog has been associated with the{Girl Guide}movement for over sixty years.At present we have approximately eighty girls shared between a{Ranger unit,two{Guide}units and two{Brownie units.During their weekly meetings all the girls work around the eight-point programme which gives them a general interest in and outlook on life.They are encouraged to enjoy the outdoors, keep fit,expore the arts,home skills, to give service in the comunity,to make friends,to think for themselves and to keep the Guide Law.During 1985 they have been celebrating 75 years of Guiding and a special flower-bed was planted in the local park with a pictorial motif connected with the Guides.In 1985 too they moved to their new headquarters in Garth Road, formerly the Church Rooms.
